attributes.action: Stop having petitions every time somebody does something somebody else dislikes
attributes.background: Just because the internet and modern technology allows for a minority or even a majority to make a point, it doesn't mean they should. I dislike almonds petition or Star Trek is Better than Star Wars na na na. It all sounds like school playground stuff. Nobody likes everything it's that simple.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
